item.title: Top Intel Democrat rips Trump administration over exclusion from boat strike briefing
item.description: A briefing held only for Republicans in Congress on U.S. military strikes is drawing a fierce rebuke from a key Democrat

item.title: Teacher who was shot by 6-year-old student at school testifies she thought she had died
item.description: A former Virginia teacher who was shot by a 6-year-old student in 2023 says she thought she died that day
